WRITING.TITLE: I made the crest shield!
WRITING.TEXT: https://imgur.com/gallery/efEyJjd I #8217;m the cosplayer Sunlight of Astora and I have just completed my crest shield to accompany my elite knight costume, I hope you like it I worked really hard for all of the templating and detailing to the way it was painted. Praise the sun! [Edit: working links] www.Instagram.com/SunlightofAstora www.facebook.com/sunlightcosplay

I will definitely be taking photos in my elite knight set once I remake my helmet. If you wanted to see what my elite looked like check out my Instagram i have all of my progress on there. Instagram.com/subject3904
I do :) I made the Astora sword as well! It #8217;s all on my Instagram find me @subject3904
It #8217;s 1:1 from in game! I put a scaled photo in the link, compared to the 1/6 scales elite knight statue :)
Hahah yeah that #8217;s me xD I don #8217;t know why I never posted my elite knight here, I #8217;m always on reddit I just don #8217;t post. When I remake the helmet I #8217;ll post it here :3

WRITING.TITLE: I made a full scale Crest shield!
WRITING.TEXT: https://imgur.com/gallery/efEyJjd I #8217;m the cosplayer Sunlight of Astora and I have just completed my crest shield to accompany my elite knight costume, I hope you like it I worked really hard for all of the templating and detailing to the way it was painted. The size comparison is in the link.Praise the sun! www.Instagram.com/SunlightofAstora www.Facebook.com/sunlightcosplay

I appreciate that friend and I #8217;ll probably do that but it is dark souls so I wanted to share with you guys :) thanks for the heads up on the links I don #8217;t know why they won #8217;t work but who ever wants to go to them can look it up if they want :) unless you know how to fix that? gt;. gt;
I #8217;m at work so I #8217;ll see what I can do but I appreciate it none the less :) now that the shield is complete I have the whole elite knight set including the Astora sword!

WRITING.TITLE: [Self] I made the elite knights weapons from Dark Souls

WRITING.TEXT: I made it out of xps foam it #8217;s really light and sandable. The detailing is craft foam. :) I hope that helps!

The link doesn #8217;t work but go check out my Instagram I made a hunter cosplay and the holy moonlight sword! Beasthunter saif is such a cool weapon! Yeah foam board sucks upgrade to that xps foam forsure.
That fixed it :) it didn #8217;t register the link without the www. But it also capitalized it and I didn #8217;t notice so thanks for that!
That #8217;d be cool to see, you should!
Apparently it reduces it to much.. :(

WRITING.TITLE: I made the saw cleaver and blunderbuss!
WRITING.TEXT: https://imgur.com/gallery/62nhngD The saw cleaver is my favorite weapon from any video game and I #8217;m happy to share the props I built from my favorite game to accompany my Hunter cosplay. Here they are in comparison to the gecco bloody hunter statue! I have progress on both of these weapons on my social media pages! www.Facebook.com/sunlightcosplay www.Instagram.com/subject3904

It took forever because I made all the templates for the armor trying to make them as accurate as possible, I made the chainmail by hand and the hardest part of all.. I even hand stitched the tunic... Dx thank you so much for the compliment!
Of course :)
You should go to my Instagram and look at my elite knight :) it may not look as good as the statue but I think I did a pretty good job. :3

Thank you! Oh no my hunter has been completed :) these are just two of my weapons. I even made the holy moonlight sword. It #8217;s all on my Instagram :3 I #8217;m thinking about posting my moonlight sword here.
I did make them myself :) I also made the holy moonlight sword!

WRITING.TITLE: I made the Holy Moonlight Sword with the abyssal cosmos
WRITING.TEXT: https://imgur.com/gallery/4OA103r Made May 21 2017 I never posted this to reddit for some reason but I feel like now is a good time to show you all something I worked incredibly hard for. Created out of foam I etched all of the detail and thinned out the inside to allow the light of the Leds to create the cosmos effect shown in the transformation cutscene of Ludwig #8217;s boss fight. It captivated me, being my favorite boss fight I gave what little prop making experience I had to create something I thought would express my love for this game. My social media accounts for those interested to see my soulsborne work! www.facebook.com/sunlightcosplay www.instagram.com/SunlightofAstora
It #8217;s one of mine to! Saw cleaver is probably my favorite but you should check out the saw cleaver and blunderbuss I posted the other day :)

WRITING.TITLE: Elite knight cosplay at DragonCon
WRITING.TEXT: https://imgur.com/gallery/TJ3SKuV Hey everyone I hope you like my elite knight armor. I put heart in soul into this. One of a kind helmet design Hand embroidered custom tunic Handmade chain mail Accurately built armor and detailed sword and shield 100% grossly incandescent You can find my work at www.facebook.com/sunlightcosplay www.instagram.com/subject3904
I am!! I #8217;ll m glad people remember that it #8217;s one of my greatest achievements as lame as that sounds haha
Priscilla yes but ceaseless I hope not hahaha
For those interested my pages are www.facebook.com/sunlightcosplay and www.instagram.com/subject3904 where I posted the making of this cosplay!
I can draw the sword easily and I can attach the shield to my back! Don #8217;t got the shield thing on video but drawing the sword haha https://imgur.com/gallery/TJ3SKuV
I #8217;ll take it!
Hahah thank you! I made both of those costumes :)
Amazing chest ahead?
Well to be fair I chose to cosplay as the #8220;chosen undead #8221; so i get to change out my weapons like my astora greatsword or longsword without not being faithful to the character ;)
